typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		StoreAltID as string,
		StoreName as string,
		StoreLocation as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
